item.description:
Hello Coffee Lovers...

I wanted to extend an invite to all of you to celebrate 2013 for an afternoon cup of coffee and great conversation at one of my favorite coffee places, Best Video & Coffee Bar.  This unique coffee shop is one of my favorites...

With interesting music, an extenstive DVD collection, occassional music performances and not to mention their delicious coffee and pastries, this charming, eccelctic, New England (CT) joint is a great place to catch up or meet new coffee lovers in the new year. 

The coffee is delicious- Willobughy's Coffee (Cappucino's, the French Roast, Expresso, etc.)

The pastries & goodies - Bread & Chocolate (Apple Turnovers, Goat Cheese & Scallion Scones, Biscotti, etc.)

DVD's - "Best of the Best", you name it and they have it.

And....Miscellaneous Pick Up Items....Farmer's Cow Milk and Apple Cider from Lebanon, CT, a pint of Gelato (Gelato Giuliana from New Haven, CT)....for those of you who would like to treat themselves to afternoon Gelato. 

This unique coffee shop/video store is everyone's morning and afternoon stop.

Looking forward to catching up with all of you in the New Year.  Have a happy, health, safe and prosperous 2013.

Cheers,

Swadhi (your Assistant Organizer)
item.name: Celebrating the new year with fellow coffee lovers at one of my favorite places.
